title: Ep 179: Lipstick Effect, Stereotype Threat and other Gender Matters
description: Do women who work in typically male dominated jobs "play down" their femininity in order to be gain more respect from their male co-workers?  In this episode we'll explore this stereotype threat as well as something you may not have heard of: the lipstick effect.  How do men and women change their appearance or their behavior during times of economic depression?  In this all-gender episode we look at these issues as well as why the new Volkswagen Beetle has changed its appearance.  Yes, the 2012 Volkswagen Beetle has become more masculine, but why?
